home-screen.description: This app supports multiple languages. And created with MVVM architecture for better separation of concerns, maintainability, and testability, ensuring a scalable codebase across different platforms and screen sizes.

explore-screen.label: This is just another tab
explore-screen.info: But this tab have no russian language, it will be replaced automatically with english

icons-screen.label: This is an example icon screen
icons-screen.description: Here you can see how to create and use icons for all entire application
icons-screen.step4: • Use this imported component with props "size" and "color" if u need
icons-screen.step5: • Next u can remove used icons from "@components/icons/" folder
